content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day January 5, 2022 Trick or Treat Ransomware or The Story Without a Happy Ending January 5, 2022 This isnt a story of Halloween costumes and candy. Its a story about a cyberattack in which the victim always pays for the trick. This type of story almost never has a happy ending. What is Ransomware?
